experience.title: My experience
experience.description: I have a specialized secondary education. I graduated with a degree in programmer in 2019. At various intervals, I was interested in different areas of development, initially, I was engaged exclusively in frontend development. I was looking for a job as a frontend developer and  I got an internship in Mentalstack. There I decided to switch to backend development, and to my surprise, I liked the backend development much more. Unluckily, employment in Russia was suspended. So now I'm looking forward to new job opportunities.

steps.title: Volga Region College of Technology and Management (2014 - 2019)
steps.description: I graduated from the Volga Region College of Technology and Management with a degree in programmer in 2019.

steps.title: Self-Study (2020 - 2021)
steps.description: At various intervals, I was interested in different areas of development, such as web development, game development. After some time, I decided to focus on web development. Initially, I was engaged exclusively in frontend development, I studied layout, and later react.

steps.title: Mentalstack (2021 - 2022)
steps.description: I got an internship in Mentalstack. I decided to switch to backend development. At the end of the internship, I was supposed to get a full-time job there, but due to the situation in the world, employment in Russia was suspended.

steps.title: 2022 - Now
steps.description: Now I'm looking forward to new job opportunities.
